member.name: M:RecoLibrary.Reco.AddImage(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new Record Object from an image and adds it to the repository
member.returns: Return true if the Record is created and successfully added to the repository, else false

member.name: M:RecoLibrary.Reco.RemoveImage(System.String)
member.summary: Remove a Record Object from the repository
member.returns: Return true if the Record is found and correctly removed from the repository, else false

member.name: M:RecoLibrary.Reco.GetNumberOfRecords
member.summary: Get the number of Records into the repository
member.returns: Return the number of Records into the repository

member.name: M:RecoLibrary.Reco.GetName(System.String)
member.summary: Compares the given image with all Records inside the repository and return the associated name of the most similar image.
member.param: Path of the image to compare
member.returns: Return name if a match is found, else an empty String

member.name: M:RecoLibrary.Reco.GetNNames(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the firsts n associated names from the comparation of the given image with all Records inside the repository, sorted from the most similar
member.param: Path of the image to compare
Expected number of names to return
member.returns: Return list of names or an empty list
